rows.label: qev055203_MSG0001
rows.name: You are human, yes? How did you find this place?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055203_MSG0002
rows.name: ...You followed the smoke? But how?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055203_MSG0003
rows.name:
This smoke should only be visible to Orpheans.
Just who—or what—are you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055203_JNK0010
rows.name: Introduce

rows.label: qev055203_SEL0011
rows.name: Explain that you're a BLADE who has come to help.

rows.label: qev055203_JNK0020
rows.name: Joke

rows.label: qev055203_SEL0021
rows.name: Say you're an avatar of justice sent by Yinotonam.

rows.label: qev055203_MSG0004
rows.name:
Ah, now I understand.
You possess a set of our goggles.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055203_MSG0005
rows.name:
I am relieved that you have come—there is a human
survivor here who needs your assistance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055203_MSG0006
rows.name:
I cannot parse that as a course of action Yin'tonam
would take.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055203_MSG0007
rows.name:
But that does match Anna's account precisely—she said
that a warrior for justice would come to our rescue.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055203_MSG0008
rows.name:
I continued to send up smoke while fleeing from
primordial creatures.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055203_MSG0009
rows.name:
My Ovah informed me that being proactive was the
optimal course of action.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055203_MSG0010
rows.name:
But the human is atop that large tree.
You must hurry and help—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055203_MSG0011
rows.name:
Oh dear. It appears your scent has lured a primordial
creature.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055203_MSG0012
rows.name:
I must humbly request that you defeat the beast.
I will hide with the human survivor up in the tree.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055203_MSG0013
rows.name:
I am pleased that you are safe, brave human.
And I deduce that the primordial creature is gone?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055203_MSG0014
rows.name: I see. That is a great help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055203_MSG0015
rows.name:
It is safe now, Anna.
We should be able to return to New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055203_MSG0016
rows.name:
We're actually saved?
Aw man, thank you so much![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055203_JNK0030
rows.name: Comfort

rows.label: qev055203_SEL0031
rows.name: Say that you're glad Anna is all right.

rows.label: qev055203_JNK0040
rows.name: Tease

rows.label: qev055203_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Anna that you're surprised she made it.

rows.label: qev055203_MSG0017
rows.name: My friends...sacrificed themselves to keep me safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055203_MSG0018
rows.name:
If Kan'tonam had also been eaten,
I just don't know what I would've done.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055203_MSG0019
rows.name:
This is all my fault, you see. Maintaining the truck was
my job, but I got lazy and blew it off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055203_MSG0020
rows.name:
My only hope was that some hero would come flying
to the rescue.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055203_MSG0021
rows.name:
And now here you are!
So...thank you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055203_MSG0022
rows.name:
But still, this is all my fault. Maintaining the truck was
my job, but I got lazy and blew it off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055203_MSG0023
rows.name:
We managed to abandon the vehicle and successfully
flee into the woods.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055203_MSG0024
rows.name:
But the chances of us escaping Noctilum by ourselves
were vanishingly small.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055203_MSG0025
rows.name:
So we took a course of action that at least offered
some chance of survival and awaited help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055203_MSG0026
rows.name:
Now let us depart. No good comes of lingering here.
We need to get Anna to the city before exhaustion
claims her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055203_MSG0027
rows.name:
I am also curious to learn more of this "long hot soak"
she so fervently desires.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055203_MSG0028
rows.name:
Er, yeaaaah. See, I was sure we were going to die,
so I kept saying I just wanted one last bath.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055203_MSG0029
rows.name:
Anyway, thank you all again so much.
Kan'tonam and I will head back to New LA now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055203_MSG0030
rows.name:
We managed to return unharmed,
thanks entirely to your efforts.[ST:wait ]
